resources.string:
Single connection is appropriate when there is only one value needs to be returned. 

Actions like "Sign in", "Upload profile image" have a single result. 

The value returned by the satellite will be delivered only once.

Cache connection fits situations where you need to show updatable data or data that needs to be cached for orientation change events. 

"Observe database table", "Get user profile from server" are such cases. 

If the mission control center is connected to the space station the value returned by the satellite will be delivered immediately. 

It the mission control center is not connected, then only the latest value will be delivered when such connection occurs.
